member.name: IInkCommitRequestHandler.OnCommitRequested
member.summary: Requests that the app commit all pending Microsoft DirectComposition commands to the app's DirectComposition visual tree.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkCommitRequestHandler
member.summary: An IInkCommitRequestHandler object enables the app (instead of an IInkPresenterDesktop object) to commit all pending Microsoft DirectComposition commands to the app's DirectComposition visual tree.
